title: 고급 의문 표현 - 철학적 질문
description: 깊이 있는 철학적 사고를 유도하는 원어민 수준의 의문 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: Is that really what matters in the end?
Is what we're pursuing truly right?
Does all of this have any meaning?
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 철학적 질문 표현 구사

sentences.en: Is that really what matters in the end?

sentences.kr: 우리가 추구하는 게 정말 옳은 건가?
sentences.en: Is what we're pursuing truly right?
Does all of this have any meaning?

sentences.kr: 우리는 올바른 길을 가고 있는 걸까?
sentences.en: Are we on the right path?
Was this the best choice we could make?

sentences.kr: 과연 그런 식으로 살아가는 게 맞을까?
sentences.en: Is it right to live that way?
